sentences.en: a bullet wound in the shoulder
A policeman accidentally killed his two best friends with a single bullet.
sentences.cn: 一名警察不慎一枪打死了他的两个挚友。

sentences.en: All Corfield got for his pains was a bullet in the head.
sentences.cn: 科菲尔德千辛万苦，到头来却被一枪爆头。

sentences.en: An 8-year-old boy was killed by a stray bullet.
sentences.cn: 一名8岁男孩儿被流弹打死。

sentences.en: As I stood up a bullet whistled past my back.
sentences.cn: 我起身时一颗子弹嗖的一声从我背后擦过。

sentences.en: Everywhere building facades are pitted with shell and bullet holes.
sentences.cn: 任一处的建筑物正面都布满了弹洞。

sentences.en: He almost bled to death after the bullet severed an artery.
sentences.cn: 子弹穿过动脉，他失血过多几乎性命不保。

sentences.en: He was killed by a single bullet.
His car has a bullet lodged in the passenger door.
sentences.cn: 他的车在客座位的门上嵌着一颗子弹。

sentences.en: His life was saved by a quarter-inch-thick bullet-proof steel screen.
sentences.cn: 多亏一块1/4英寸厚的防弹钢板，他才捡了条命。

sentences.en: It was already impossible to tell where the bullet had entered.
sentences.cn: 已经无法判断子弹是从哪里打进来的。

sentences.en: Several bullet holes could be seen beside a window.
sentences.cn: 窗户边可以看到几个弹孔。

sentences.en: The bullet had entered the top part of the brain.
sentences.cn: 子弹已经进入了大脑顶部。

sentences.en: The bullet had passed less than an inch from Andrea's heart.
sentences.cn: 子弹在离安德烈亚的心脏不到一英寸的地方穿过。

sentences.en: The bullet lodged in the sergeant's leg, shattering his thigh bone.
sentences.cn: 子弹嵌进了中士的腿里，使其股骨碎裂。

sentences.en: The bullet slammed into the ceiling, spraying them with bits of plaster.
sentences.cn: 子弹砰地射进了天花板，掉落的石膏碎片落了他们一身。

sentences.en: Tour operators may be forced to bite the bullet and cut prices.
sentences.cn: 旅行社的经营者们可能不得不忍痛降价。

sentences.en: Use bold type for headings and bullet points for noteworthy achievements.
sentences.cn: 标题使用粗黑字体，显著的成就要用着重号标示。

words.tran_cn: [军]子弹；只选某党全部候选人的投票；豆子

phrases.tran_cn: 忍痛，咬紧牙关；咬子弹（强忍痛苦）

trans.tran_en: a small piece of metal that you fire from a gun
